T02D3097:190a-0: @190a * // lha mo gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3097:190a-1: rnal 'byor bas rims bsrung par 'dod na /
T02D3097:190a-2: dang po mchod pa dang gtor mas rims kyi 'byung po tshim par byas te /
T02D3097:190a-3: bden pa'i stobs kyis brjod ba dang gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D3097:190a-4: de nas gdugs dkar mo'i gzungs bris te /
T02D3097:190a-5: bsgrub par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su de gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags te /
T02D3097:190a-6: mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te /
T02D3097:190a-7: rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te /
T02D3097:190a-9: de yang nyin mtshan dus drug tu gdugs dkar mo
T02D3097:190a-10: 'khor dang bcas pa la gsol ba gdab pa dang
T02D3097:190a-11: / mchod bstod dang bskor ba byas te /
T02D3097:190a-13: bsrung ba yang gdags par bya'o //
T02D3097:190a-14: dpal tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
T02D3097:190a-15: mgon po la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D3097:190a-16: de nas bsgrub bya gdugs dkar mo'i spyan sngar phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D3097:190a-19: bskor ba thun bzhir bya zhing gdon gyi tshogs rnams la gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D3097:190a-20: khyad par du rims kyi 'byung po la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D3097:190a-21: cho ga de lta bu dang ldan pas thun bzhir gzungs 'don par bya'o //
T02D3097:190a-22: tha mar yang 'phags pa la mchod pa dang /
T02D3097:190a-23: srung ma'i tshogs la gtor ma rgya chen po sbyin no //
